title: Knowledge Base
subtitle: Manage FAQs, objections, success stories and more

form.title: Add New Knowledge
form.question: Question
form.tagsPlaceholder: Separate by comma: price, delivery, support

placeholders.question: Ex: What is the delivery time?
placeholders.answerObjection: How the agent should respond to this objection...

list.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this knowledge?

search.title: Test Semantic Search
search.description: Simulate how the agent will search for information in the knowledge base when receiving a question.
search.placeholder: Ex: How much does it cost? How does delivery work?
search.tip: Tip: The search uses artificial intelligence to find semantically similar knowledge, even if the words are different.

messages.emptyQuery: Enter a query to test the search

settings.title: Search Settings
settings.description: Adjust the vector search sensitivity to control result precision.
settings.sensitivityDescription: Sets the minimum similarity level to return results

explanations.low: Returns more results, even with low similarity. Useful when you have few items in the knowledge base.
explanations.medium: Balance between quantity and precision. Recommended for most cases.
explanations.high: Returns only results with good similarity. Ideal for well-structured knowledge bases.
explanations.veryHigh: Returns only very precise matches. May miss relevant information.
